amendment.description: Relating to alternative analyses of intelligence by the intelligence community.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3932 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3932 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S10248-10250; text: CR S10249) Relating to alternative analyses of intelligence by the intelligence community.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3932 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
